analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/27/0x73c452b7ceb224f91955baa97a1c3f3c2dfffbf1.sol#125-280) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/27/0x73c452b7ceb224f91955baa97a1c3f3c2dfffbf1.sol#191-194)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/27/0x73c452b7ceb224f91955baa97a1c3f3c2dfffbf1.sol#63-83) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenStockAddress,msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/27/0x73c452b7ceb224f91955baa97a1c3f3c2dfffbf1.sol#79-83)
TokenERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x73c452b7ceb224f91955baa97a1c3f3c2dfffbf1.sol#127-129)
owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x73c452b7ceb224f91955baa97a1c3f3c2dfffbf1.sol#119) should be declared external
